1.title: Balloons
1.plot: The skies of New Mexico fill with hundreds of hot air balloons for a week of dreamy aeronautics. After flying in and among the technicolor aircraft, take your own flight of fancy, then observe a unique chainsaw carving competition and an amazing fireworks display.

2.title: New York Ships
2.plot: Against the backdrop of NYC, there is a bustling seaport scene straight out of another century: clipper ships, a heroic fireboat and a sloop that helped to clean up the Hudson River. Views of the South Street Seaport, the Brooklyn Bridge and the Statue of Liberty are an inspired juxtaposition to the dazzling nautical tableau.

3.title: Malibu
3.plot: Malibu defines the California state of mind. Cruise the thin ribbon of Pacific Coast Highway as sun seekers splash in the sea, surfers paddle through foamy curling waves, bikers rumble along on chrome-plated Harleys, sailors harness gentle winds, tai chi enthusiasts practice their martial arts.

4.title: Small Planes
4.plot: Fly along with a wide variety of small planes and spend a heart-pounding moments jumping into the wild blue yonder with a 100 person team of synchronized skydivers. In this episode, you will experience both the adrenalin and serenity that define man's love of flight.

5.title: Ajax
5.plot: Massive chunks of rock are blasted in a quarry. Giant transport vehicles scoop up the raw material to be delivered to the concrete and asphalt factories. Road crews pour and smooth the "mud" into smooth highways. Ride shotgun on some of the most powerful that lay down the roads upon which millions of cars ride every day.

6.title: Washington DC
6.plot: Washington, DC has numerous sights that impress visitors with grandeur, historical importance and artistic achievement. In this episode, we give you a fully dimensional, insider's view of this often-photographed city, touring the seats of our government's power including the White House, the Capitol and the Supreme Court. Next, peer in and around monuments and memorials and many more sights that define this capital city.

7.title: The Road to Hana
7.plot: Cruise along one of the most beautiful stretches of highway in the world. Stop at the towering waterfalls, black sand beaches, and serene pools that are sacred in the Hawaiian culture. Ride along on zip wires, surfboards, and whale watching boats for a unique view of the island of Maui.

8.title: Rock Climbing
8.plot: The California outdoors is a Mecca for climbers. From the mystical desert landscape of Joshua Tree National Park to the snow-capped Sierra Nevada Mountain town of Bishop, CA, we hang out with fearless boulderers and rock climbers who take us along for a heart-racing ascent to places that few people-let alone cameras-dare to go.

9.title: Thrill Rides
9.plot: There may be no greater thrill ride than sitting in the front row of a towering roller coaster. At Busch Gardens in Tampa, FL we ride along on several heart-pounding rides. After an interlude at the park's African safari, we're be back in the action, speeding along at speeds nearing 100 mph and 5 G's, twisting and turning into space.

10.title: Race Cars
10.plot: Test drive some of the world's most rare and valuable race cars. Passionate drivers and pit crews push these mighty machines to screech through hairpin turns and burn rubber on the straightaway. Welcome to the Inde Motorsports Raceway, where viewers will almost feel the impact as these supercharged machines fly by.
